Majestic Seacreature

Me with my wife Jia in Wuhan, China. In case you were wondering, I am the guy eating the sweet potato, and my wife is wearing the red jacket.

Hi, I am Gregory Brown.

I am the founder of Mendicant University, a free online school for software developers. I am also the author of the Practicing Ruby newsletter, and the original developer of the PDF generation library Prawn. These projects are living proof of my love for teaching, writing, and building stuff.

MAJESTIC SEACREATURE is my personal site. Here you will find a dump of links to things that interest me every Tuesday, a new essay every Wednesday, and a progress report about the various software and educational projects I'm working on every Thursday.
